keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Brexit by revoking Article 50, ensuring better opportunities for our country, bringing certainty and stability.
Generate 80% of electricity from renewables by 2030, upgrading transport and other infrastructure.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give Every Child the Best Start in Life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 20,000 more teachers, invest an extra £10 billion a year in schools.
Invest £130 billion in infrastructure, policies for a better economy, supporting a fairer society.
Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health, improving services significantly.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit by revoking Article 50, ensuring better opportunities for our country, bringing certainty and stability.
issues.economy: Invest £130 billion in infrastructure, policies for a better economy, supporting a fairer society.
issues.education: Recruit 20,000 more teachers, invest an extra £10 billion a year in schools.
issues.environment: Generate 80% of electricity from renewables by 2030, upgrading transport and other infrastructure.
issues.health: Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health, improving services significantly.

endorsements.endorser: Gavin Esler, Rachel Johnson, Gabriel Rozenberg
endorsements.endorsement: Supporting the Liberal Democrats' policies, which they believe are best for the country's future.

images.caption: Jo Swinson with supporters holding Liberal Democrats placards.
